newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentina to launch mail privatization project.
newsitem.headline: Argentina to launch mail privatization project.

text.p: Argentine President Carlos Menem will sign the decree to privatize the country's postal service on Thursday or Friday, the Economy Ministry said on Thursday.

Julio Caceres, the coordination secretary at the ministry, told journalists the privatization project and the terms that establish the 30-year concession have already been signed by Economy Minister Roque Fernandez.
He said the winner of the bidding would have to make a certain amount of investment, although he did not mention any figures. In addition, postal rates will have to be decreased until 2003.
There will be a minimum amount required on the bids in the tender as well. Caceres said the postal services have annual sales of 500 million pesos.
